description: Irregular triangle T(n, m) read by rows: row n gives the distinct length ratios diagonal/side of regular n-gons, DSR(n, k), for n >= 2, k = 1, 2, ..., floor(n/2), expressed by the coefficients in the power basis of the Galois group Gal(Q(rho(n))/Q), where rho(n) = 2*cos(Pi/n), for n >= 2. T(1, 1) is set to 1.
